mutants.code:
def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 / n2)
    n1 += n2 * result
    return n1

def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 / n2)
    n1 -= n2 / result
    return n1

def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 / n2)
    n1 -= n2 + result
    return n1

def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 / n2)
    n1 -= n2 ** result
    return n1

def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 * n2)
    n1 -= n2 * result
    return n1

def modulo_without_operator(n1, n2):
    n2 = abs(n2)
    result = round(n1 // n2)
    n1 -= n2 * result
    return n1
